data.title: shahid kapoor film: Latest News & Videos, Photos about shahid kapoor film
data.meta_description: shahid kapoor film Latest Breaking News, Pictures, Videos, and Special Reports from The Economic Times. shahid kapoor film  Blogs, Comments and Archive News on Economictimes.com
data.text:
Go To Page 1

Jab They Met: Kareena Kapoor royally ignores former flame Shahid Kapoor at Dadasaheb Phalke Awards!

The 'X' Factor: Kareena and Shahid met on the sets of the 2004 romantic thriller 'Fida'. Although the film bombed at the box-office, sparks flew between the leads. The duo dated for three yeas before calling it quits in 2007. Ironically, their last film together 'Jab We Met' (the duo were rumoured to not be on speaking terms on the sets), ended up being one of the most successful films in their careers!

21 Feb, 2024, 03:14 PM IST

'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' exceeds expectations: Shahid Kapoor's film crosses Rs 14 cr worldwide on day 1

​Produced by Maddock Films, 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' also features veteran actors Dharmendra and Dimple Kapadia in pivotal roles. It is co-produced by Jyoti Deshpande and Laxman Utekar.

10 Feb, 2024, 11:44 PM IST

Shahid Kapoor gives his take on Hrithik Roshan's 'burden of being a star' comment

Shahid Kapoor responded to Hrithik Roshan's remarks about the "burden of being a star." He expressed understanding but revealed his "opposite problem," emphasizing the importance of not losing the actor within himself. Drawing inspiration from iconic figures like Leonardo DiCaprio and Amitabh Bachchan, Shahid aspires to blend stardom with profound acting.

02 Feb, 2024, 09:38 AM IST

Shahid Kapoor-Kriti Sanon's robot drama eyes a February release

The first shooting schedule of the upcoming movie 'Deva,' starring Shahid Kapoor and Pooja Hegde, has concluded in Mumbai.

Shahid Kapoor to next star in 'Deva' opposite Pooja Hegde, film set to hit theatres in October 2024

Actor Shahid Kapoor has announced that his upcoming action thriller film will be titled 'Deva' and is set to release on October 11, 2024. Directed by Rosshan Andrrews, the movie also stars Pooja Hegde.

Pooja Hegde to star opposite Shahid Kapoor in new action thriller

The as-yet-untitled film is about a brilliant yet rebellious police officer investigating a high-profile case. As he delves deeper into the case, he uncovers a web of deceit and betrayal, leading him down a thrilling and dangerous path.

'It has more to do with age than gender': Oscar-winning producer Guneet Monga Kapoor on facing obstacles in her showbiz journey

Producer Guneet Monga Kapoor, who has two Oscars to her credit, hopes her journey will inspire young producers to join the Indian film industry. The 39-year-old said being young was more challenging than being a woman in the industry.

Kartik Aaryan buys luxury apartment for Rs 17.50 crore in Mumbai’s Juhu

Kartik Aaryan has paid stamp duty of Rs 1.05 crore for the registration of the deal that took place on June 30. He will also get exclusive access to two car parking slots in the tower. The transaction was executed by the actor’s mother Mala Tiwari on the actor’s behalf, showed the documents accessed through Indextap.com.

Shahid Kapoor is making his OTT debut with Farzi and will be streaming on Prime Video from February 10. The 41-year-old says this character brief from Farzi was something he could “easily” relate to.
